item.title: DIG L.S. Chauhan Reviews Police Readiness in Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Indian Masterminds Stories
As part of the annual review process, DIG Jogulamba Zone, Shri L.S. Chauhan, IPS, carried out a comprehensive inspection of police establishments across Jogulamba Gadwal district on Saturday. He was accompanied by District Superintendent of Police Shri T. Srinivas Rao, IPS.
DIG Chauhan visited the Alampur Circle Office, Alampur and Gadwal Rural Police Stations, and the District Police Headquarters. During his inspection, he meticulously reviewed station records, insp...]]>
item.author: Indian Masterminds Bureau
